summary: REQ-5/REQ-8 appear implemented via a new influencers data module and UI updates in TemplateDetailPage/TemplateCard for richer content. REQ-6 is only partially implemented (editableContent added for some templates but not all). REQ-7 cannot be confirmed because the diff summary does not show the required new thumbnail image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Seed templates in frontend/src/data/seedTemplates.ts include non-empty editableContent for each template.
missing_requirements.reason: At least one seeded template explicitly sets editableContent to an empty Uint8Array, and the diff summary indicates only the first few templates include rich editableContent. The requirement calls for non-empty editableContent for each seeded template.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add multiple visually distinct template thumbnail images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from seed templates.
missing_requirements.reason: Seed templates reference new generated thumbnail paths, but the diff summary does not list any added/modified files under frontend/public/assets/generated (no image assets shown). Based on the provided diff summary alone, the new required images cannot be verified as added.

hallucinated_features.description: Screenshot protection / anti-screenshot behavior (disabling right-click, key combos like PrintScreen, dragstart prevention) and related CSS classes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in REQ-5 through REQ-8; adds new behavioral restrictions unrelated to influencer handles, editableContent defaults, thumbnails, or layout accommodation.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions screenshot protection CSS in frontend/src/index.css)

hallucinated_features.description: Subscription/paywall and routing behavior changes (e.g., removing subscription guard from editor route; removing subscription badge in header; pricing/checkout flow changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the BuildRequest; the request explicitly focuses on influencers, editableContent defaults, thumbnail variety, and layout updates for richer content.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to template visibility without authentication (useGetAllTemplates modified to work without authentication requirement).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-5 through REQ-8; this is an access/authorization behavior change not mentioned in the BuildRequest.
